Ekwenti Samsung Ihe ncheputa  bụ ebe a na eme mmekọrịta (nke na-akwado Java, Symbian, Bada na Windows Mobile ) nke Samsung mepụtara iji guzobe mmekọrịta ya na ndị mmepe ngwanrọ na ndị ọzọ na-enye aka na mmepe mpanaka gburugburu ebe obibi, ịnwale na ikesa ngwa na echiche mkpanaka
A na-edozi ma na-emezi mmekọrịta ndị ahụ site na webụsaịtị, forums, blọgụ na saịtị ịkparịta ụka n'Ịntanet.

Mmemme batara beta na Septemba 1, 2008  wee mara ọkwa n'oge Ọktọba 2008 Smartphone Show na Earls Court, London site na Ho-Shoo Lee, EVP nke Mobile Solutions center maka Samsung Eletrọniks  Na mmalite nke mmemme ahụ, ọ bụ naanị ngwaọrụ Symbian S60 ka kwadoro
Ugbu a Windows Mobile na ekwentị dabere na Java na-akwadokwa site na mmemme.
Ebubere saịtị Samsung Mobile Innovator n'asụsụ Bekee naanị
Na Machị 13, 2009 a gbasaara saịtị ahụ ka ọ gụnyekwa Chinese
Emegharịrị mmemme ahụ dị ka Samsung Developers na 2013.

Ọ bụ ezie na ngwaọrụ mkpanaaka na-arụ otu sistemụ arụmọrụ ga-akwado ọtụtụ atụmatụ API ndị akọwapụtara na OEM na-adịkarịghị enweta ndị mmepe na-enweghị ụfọdụ injin ngbanwe.  Samsung emeela ọtụtụ njirimara ekwentị akọwapụtara maka ndị mmepe site na akwụkwọ yana SDK na-enye ndị mmepe ikike ijikwa ma na-emekọrịta LEDs nke ngwaọrụ mkpanaka, flash igwefoto, accelerometer, na njirimara ndị ọzọ akọwapụtara nke ọma na-adịghị ekpughe site na API sistemụ arụmọrụ.
Ndị mmepe nwekwara ike ịnwale ngwa ha ozugbo site na ihe Samsung na-akpọ Lab.dev
Ọ bụ ezie na Lab.dev a Mmepụta nwere ike idowe oge maka otu Samsung ekwentị na remotely bulite ha ngwa na ekwentị na-emekọ ihe na ekwentị site na ha nchọgharị.
Samsung na-anabata atụmatụ azụmaahịa site na mmemme Market.dev ha
Ndị mbipụta sọftụwia ga-enwe ike ikesa ngwa ha site na Ụlọ Ahịa Ngwa Samsung.
